actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and one Headbutt attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d10+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Headbutt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Forceful Spit (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Launches a stream of pessurized water from its mouth in a 30' line that is 5 ft. wide  Each creature in that line: 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 20' away from the lionfish and is knocked prone (DC 14 Dex half damage and is pushed up to 10 ft. away from the lionfish and isn't knocked prone.)

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 30'+ straight to foe and hits with Headbutt attack on same turn target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Coral Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The lionfish has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in underwater terrain that includes plant life or coral reefs.

special_abilities.name: Envenomed Spines
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches lionfish or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it: 7 (2d6) poison.

special_abilities.name: Poison Affinity
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves vs. being poisoned.
